p: Among the core Al responsive proteins, three proteins, TRINITY_DN51434_c0_g1; chaperonin CPN60-2, TRINITY_DN52787_c0_g1; phosphoglycerate kinase 1, and TRINITY-DN50533-c0-g8; unknown protein, were up-regulated under CK-04 vs. CK-0, while their expression was down-regulated in LB-04 vs. LB-0. The other proteins showed a similar regulation pattern in both groups, demonstrating the conserved roles of these proteins under Al-stress conditions independently of SL inoculation.
